control

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is main controller class to control all backend of game.
    Version:
    3.0

        Constructor of class to initialize all parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - Human name.
        mark2 - Player 2 mark.
        mark1 - Player 1 mark.
        totalRound - Rounds which player selected.
        HumanTurn - is the turn dedicated to human player
        level - is the difficulty level
